title: Can not bring up Firefox by hitting the icon in the dock.
content: I'm a Mac user on desktop. Something happened to my Firefox about two weeks ago. I was able to bring up Firefox which had all my bookmarks, passwords, etc. What is different is that I can not bring up Firefox by hitting the icon in the dock. If Firefox is already up and I hit he icon, it will jump to the front. But not if it is sitting in the dock.
creator: conradcohen

title: Lost Tab When Opening a Group
content:
I set up a new Group with 14 tabs. From my main page I open the Group in a new window, peruse the 14 tabs, then save and close the Group. If I re-open the Group in a new window during he same main session, the Group opens in a new window perfectly. If I shut down the computer and re-open my main page a day later, AND then open the Group in a new window, one of the Group tabs opens in the main window and 13 open in the Group window. I then re-add the open tab from the main window to the open Group window. Again, I get the same behavior with all 14 tabs opening in the Group window during the same session, but only 13 in the Group window if I shut sown the computer and re-open a day later. Anyone have a solution??

Thank you!

--Rick
creator: taxmanrick

title: Add firefox to task bar Windows 11
